sentences.en: A tired brown spaniel kept close at their heels.
sentences.cn: 紧紧跟在他们脚后的是一只棕色的西班牙猎狗.

sentences.en: A tired brown spaniel kept close at their teels.
sentences.cn: 一只疲惫的褐色西班牙猎犬紧跟着他们.

sentences.en: A variant in the KRT 71 gene produces curly coated dogs, such as the Irish water spaniel.
sentences.cn: 携带KRT71基因变异的狗往往是卷毛, 爱尔兰斯班尼犬就是这样.

sentences.en: Anastasia clutched her King Charles spaniel.
sentences.cn: 安娜斯塔西娅怀抱着她的玳瑁.

sentences.en: I take my cocker spaniel to be groomed once a week.
sentences.cn: 我每星期都带我的科卡犬去美容呢.

sentences.en: I've always wanted a springer spaniel.
sentences.cn: 我一直想要一只激飞狗.

sentences.en: Little Trot, a tiny spaniel was comfortably curled up on her back.
sentences.cn: 那只哈叭狗小特洛特这时候正舒舒服服地蜷曲着身子伏在它背上.

sentences.en: Master Huang: Yeah. A dog! A Springer spaniel!
sentences.cn: 黄师父: 对. 狗! 一条长毛垂耳狗!

sentences.en: My Cocker Spaniel is a merry dog.
sentences.cn: 我的可卡是只欢快的小狗.

sentences.en: My mother had insisted that she wanted a dog, and it had to be a spaniel.
sentences.cn: 我妈妈坚持要一只狗, 而且非得是猎不可.

sentences.en: Spaniel is a breed of dog with large ears.
sentences.cn: 西班牙猎狗是一种长着大耳朵的猎狗.

sentences.en: The Cocker Spaniel is the smallest member of the Sporting Group.
sentences.cn: 可卡是运动犬组中最小的.

sentences.en: The dog was similar in general a spaniel.
sentences.cn: 这条狗总的来看像西班牙猎狗.

sentences.en: What president had a spaniel whose doghouse was decorated with framed political photographs?
sentences.cn: 哪位总统有一只西班牙猎狗,该狗有用镜框装裱的政治图片装饰其狗屋?

words.tran_cn: 西班牙的；西班牙语的；西班牙人的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 一种英国的小猎犬

trans.tran_en: a type of dog with long ears that hang down
